text:
Market News   Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Cognizant Technology Says CEO Francisco D’Souza's FY 2017 Adjusted SEC Total Compensation Was $12.5 Mln Vs $12 Mln In FY 2016 - SEC Filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
